name: Internet Detective Club
description:
This game was made for Ludum Dare 52. The theme was 'Harvest'. Unfortunately ran out of time, so it's cut short and has some bugs, but I do plan on finishing this. Check back later for an updated version.

PLOT: Detectives exist in all places, especially on the internet! Meet the members of the Internet Detective Club and join them on their virtual and IRL adventures!
